name: SPACE RAT (AspyrianLabs)
description:
After SpaceY cut off the settlers, things regressed rapidly. Technology decayed and skills atrophied. Struggling to fit under the biodome, they had no choice but to build upwards. 

Scurry among the shanty town, infecting the food and water supply as SPACE RAT - a vector of plague that might just finish off this struggling Martian colony.

Infect market stalls and wells. 

Hide from colonists.

Plagued colonists return home and gain a red X on their door: stand by the door to raid their pantry and top up your hunger metre. 

***

This was made in a weekend for the "poison" Minijam. The navigation is totally borked, just try to enjoy the Future-Medieval vibes.

Big thank you to Stringerrr for his phenomenal music, which helped to inspire the setting and is frankly the only reason to play the game 🕺

Join our discord to stay up to date with our main project UTOPIUM (aka Brave New World meets Severance meets Hotline Miami) https://discord.gg/FECee6cj 

Follow our most glorious twitter profile Aspyrian Labs (@AspyrianLabs) / Twitter

🙏
